name: Faisal ahmed
profile: Experienced PHP and Laravel developer with over 10 years of experience in web development and 5 years in teaching. Passionate about coding, mentoring, and helping students become proficient developers.

responsibilities: Designing and delivering PHP and Laravel courses for beginners and advanced students.
Creating course materials, including video tutorials, assignments, and projects.
Mentoring students through one-on-one sessions and providing career advice.
Conducting workshops and webinars on advanced Laravel topics.
Collaborating with other instructors to develop comprehensive full-stack development courses.
Developed and maintained web applications using PHP and Laravel.
Collaborated with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
Designed and optimized database schemas for high-performance applications.
Implemented RESTful APIs for mobile and web clients.
Mentored junior developers and conducted code reviews.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

projects.name: Online Learning Platform
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive online learning platform using Laravel, including course management, user authentication, and payment processing.

projects.name: E-commerce Website
projects.description: Built a fully functional e-commerce website with product catalog, shopping cart, and order management features.
